thread.title: 'Drug dealer' set alight in Masiphumelele
thread.title_full: 'Drug dealer' set alight in Masiphumelele | News24

author: news24.com
title: 'Drug dealer' set alight in Masiphumelele
text:
Cape Town - No arrests have been made after a man accused of being a drug dealer was burnt alive in a vigilante attack in Masiphumelele in the early hours of Saturday morning.
Community police forum chairperson Kathy Cronje told News24 residents took to the streets on Friday night.
“They went door-to-door in search of drug dealers. One was found [in the early hours of the morning] and he was burnt to death,” she said.
Police spokesperson Captain FC Van Wyk said the man died in Nyeza Street at 00:45.
